# blastshield_policies (Data Source)

Lists Blastshield policys with optional filters.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `enabled` (Boolean) Filter by enabled.
- `from_groups` (List of Number) Filter by from_groups.
- `id` (List of Number) Filter by id.
- `log` (Boolean) Filter by log.
- `name` (List of String) Filter by name.
- `services` (List of Number) Filter by services.
- `tags` (List of String) Filter by tags.
- `to_groups` (List of Number) Filter by to_groups.

### Read-Only

- `policies` (Attributes List) List of policies matching the filters. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--policies))

<a id="nestedatt--policies"></a>
### Nested Schema for `policies`

Read-Only:

- `enabled` (Boolean)
- `from_groups` (Set of Number)
- `id` (Number)
- `log` (Boolean)
- `name` (String)
- `services` (Set of Number)
- `tags` (Map of String)
- `to_groups` (Set of Number)
